paragraph: Rena Uehara (上原 れな, Uehara Rena, born August 12, 1986) is a female Japanese singer-songwriter originally from Hyogo, Japan and now residing in Osaka. She is known for performing theme songs for OVAs of Utawarerumono and To Heart 2. She has also done the opening for White Album 2, Todokanai Koi '13. On December 28, 2015, she had announced that she will go hiatus to treat her voice because she was diagnosed with psychogenic disphonia.
Niji no Kakehashi (虹の架け橋), released March 26, 2008
Cosmos no You ni (コスモスのように), released March 26, 2008
Yume no Tsuzuki (夢のつづき), released June 24, 2009
Todokanai Koi '13 (届かない恋 '13), released November 6, 2013
The Brilliant Best ~Tie-Up Collection~ (The Brilliant Best～タイアップコレクション～), released August 7, 2013
